alert.note: Alert for Mecklenburg (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 17 at 3:42AM EDT until further notice by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Wakefield VA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Virginia... Allen Creek near Boydton affecting Mecklenburg County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring due to excessive rainfall Tuesday evening. * WHERE...Allen Creek near Boydton. * WHEN...From early this morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 16.5 feet, Hayes Mill Road begins to flood about 100 Feet east of Allen Creek. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:30 AM EDT Wednesday the stage was 15.7 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 2:30 AM EDT Wednesday was 15.7 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 15.7 feet on 03/07/1992. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 345 PM EDT.
